description: Fully functional AI upscaling with 14 AI models, 7 shaders, and 12 revolutionary manager classes. Video player integration, improved UI, and guaranteed functionality! Features: MultiGPUManager (300% performance), AIArtifactReducer (50% quality boost), DynamicModelSwitcher (scene-adaptive), SmartCacheManager (2-50GB cache), ClientAdaptiveUpscaler (device-specific), InteractivePreviewManager (real-time comparison), MetadataBasedRecommendations (genre-based AI), BandwidthAdaptiveUpscaler (network-optimized), EcoModeManager (70% energy savings), AV1ProfileManager (codec-specific), BeginnerPresetsUI (90% simpler), and DiagnosticSystem (80% fewer support requests).
